testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Shortcut for displaying outdated Candidate Versions ?[90m# mnemonics.feature:49?[0m ?[32mGiven ?[0m?[32mthe candidate "?[0m?[32m?[1mgrails?[0m?[32m" version "?[0m?[32m?[1m1.3.9?[0m?[32m" is already installed and default?[0m ?[90m# installation_steps.groovy:22?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mthe default "?[0m?[32m?[1mgrails?[0m?[32m" candidate is "?[0m?[32m?[1m2.4.4?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# stub_steps.groovy:8?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mthe candidate "?[0m?[32m?[1mgroovy?[0m?[32m" version "?[0m?[32m?[1m2.0.5?[0m?[32m" is already installed and default?[0m ?[90m# installation_steps.groovy:22?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mthe default "?[0m?[32m?[1mgroovy?[0m?[32m" candidate is "?[0m?[32m?[1m2.4.1?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# stub_steps.groovy:8?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mthe system is bootstrapped?[0m ?[90m# initialisation_steps.groovy:115?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter "?[0m?[32m?[1msdk o?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# command_line_interop_steps.groovy:5?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see "?[0m?[32m?[1mOutdated:?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# command_line_interop_steps.groovy:15?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI see "?[0m?[32m?[1mgrails (1.3.9 < 2.4.4)?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# command_line_interop_steps.groovy:15?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI see "?[0m?[32m?[1mgroovy (2.0.5 < 2.4.1)?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# command_line_interop_steps.groovy:15?[0m
